name: Ant-Light 2
description:
The Story So Far:

One day, out of nowhere, a strange fog enveloped the earth. Now, darkness shrouds the land and everything is unwell.

One day, an ordinary ant (you), awakens to "the power of light". You must seek the highest place on earth and spread light once again to the entire world.

Instructions:

To begin the game, use the arrow keys. To end the game. reach the edge of the screen.
